verbose_text: Braf is the most potent of the Raf proteins to activate the downstream signalling cascade, hence mutant Braf was identified as a novel target for kinase inhibitors such as vemurafenib (PLX4032 / RG7204) XREF_BIBR XREF_BIBR XREF_BIBR and dabrafenib XREF_BIBR.
evidence: Raf proteins to activate the downstream signalling cascade
